deskripsi: job description in bank mandiri we are committed to driving innovation and delivering exceptional products that exceed customer expectations we are seeking a passionate and experienced product owner to join our dynamic team and help shape the future of our offerings as a product owner you will be the key liaison between the development team and stakeholders ensuring that our products meet the needs of our customers you will be responsible for defining and prioritizing product features managing the product backlog and ensuring the successful delivery of high-quality products if you like to become a creator and a product designer with the goal of achieving customer satisfaction build great customer experiences while balancing business goals risk management compliance technical constraints and time to market launch products and passionately engage with customer feedback then you are the one were looking for key responsibilities collaborate with stakeholders to understand business needs and translate them into clear product requirements define and prioritize the product backlog ensuring alignment with business goals and customer needs work closely with the development team to ensure timely and high-quality delivery of product features communicate the product vision and roadmap to both internal and external stakeholders monitor and evaluate product performance making data-driven decisions to enhance the product lead sprint planning review and retrospective meetings act as the primary point of contact for all product-related inquiries and issues continuously gather feedback from users and stakeholders to improve the product requirements minimum 4 years of experience preferably in related roles product owner product manager product designer business analyst bachelors degree from a reputable university experience with mobile applications or digital products is preferred strong communication skills to work effectively with stakeholders from diverse backgrounds strong understanding of agile methodologies particularly scrum proven ability to define and prioritize product features based on business and customer needs excellent communication and interpersonal skills strong analytical and problem-solving abilities ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced environment experience with product management tools such as jira confluence or similar is a plus

return discrepancies or variances monitor the progress of scanning returns ensure returns receiving process as per timeline monitor the segregation of products maintain the return summary reports task sales and events and support market level operations and improvement inter-department communication organizing the documents library for pod maintain the digital documents library for audit purpose po for all vendors for payment processing responsible to submit po for approval to hod and submit to finance task 6 ad hoc involve and support for any warehouse projects involve and support for any deskripsi: what will you do the data analyst is responsible for conducting in-depth data analysis to assess and mitigate risks within the organization this role involves collecting organizing and interpreting large datasets to identify trends patterns and potential risks that could impact the companys operations the data analyst and protection officer will collaborate with cross-functional teams to provide actionable insights and recommendations to enhance risk management strategies and ensure the companys overall stability also ensuring the data security and recommending improvements for the data privacy and protection process and data breach incident response plan job description  collect clean and preprocess data from various sources to ensure accuracy and completeness analyze and interpret complex datasets using statistical and data visualization techniques to identify potential risks and trends collaborate with risk management teams to define risk metrics and develop models for assessing and quantifying risks monitor and track key risk indicators kris and key performance indicators kpis to identify emerging risks and trends produce comprehensive reports and presentations summarizing risk analysis findings for stakeholders and senior management collaborate with it teams to ensure data integrity security and compliance with data protection regulations participate in the development and improvement of risk management strategies policies and procedures stay updated on industry trends and best practices in risk management and data analysis job qualifications  bachelors degree in a relevant field such as finance economics statistics mathematics or computer science proven experience 3 years in data analysis or a related field financial technology is a plus proficiency in data analysis tools such as python or sql query and experience with data visualization tools e g tableau power bi strong proficiency in ms excel strong in data query knowledge of iso 27001 is a plus point familiarity with financial products markets and regulatory requirements is a plus excellent analytical skills with the ability to work with complex large datasets and draw actionable insights strong communication skills to convey complex findings and insights to both technical and non-technical stakeholders detail-oriented mindset with a focus on accuracy and precision in data analysis ability to work collaboratively in cross-functional teams and adapt to changing priorities problem-solving mindset and the ability to think critically and creatively to address emerging risks professional certifications related to risk management or data analysis e g frm cfa crma are desirable but not mandatory are you ready to be samiritans were on the deskripsi: if you just click apply you will not receive a response you must follow the instructions below under how to apply for our team to review and respond to your application complete and qualified applications receive a response within 24 hours summary of opportunity position fresh graduate management training program location jakarta surabaya bandung semarang yogyakarta lampung medan or batam deliveree is seeking ambitious hard working and career-focused candidates who have recently received their undergraduate degree from a recognized university in indonesia or abroad all majors are welcome to apply to qualify you must have a strong interest in business or operations in a logistics technology environment you must be willing to work very hard in a fast moving accelerated environment with your career development as your top priority when you interview with us you will be considered for assignment in several possible departments including enterprise sales digital marketing operational excellence supply chain management booking operations fleet training fleet recruiting telemarketing finance human resources and administration you are encouraged to rotate to new departments once you have mastered your current assignment this usually takes 2 years while we expect you to be mobile and able to travel your home base will be either our jakarta hq or satellite offices in surabaya bandung semarang or yogyakarta if this description excites you please read our qualification requirements below and then follow the instructions carefully under how to apply qualifications undergraduate gpa of 3 0 or higher from any major fresh graduates or candidates with 1-2 years of experience are welcome to apply excellent english skills excellent speaking and writing skills self-motivated independent and hard-working strong reasoning logic and analysis skills benefits competitive monthly salary merit-based promotions full private healthcare coverage annual paid leave 13th-month bonus remote working for 6 weeks every year available during ramadan and christmas how to apply submit the below items via email to christine at deliveree dot com - if you submit all be fluent or strong in communication highly organized and able to work independently while contributing to a collaborative team environment if youre passionate about providing excellent service keeping an office running smoothly and engaging with customers through social media wed love to hear from you as a customer service and office administration staff you will be responsible for a and organizational skills a creative mindset and the ability to manage multiple responsibilities what youll be doing provide exceptional service to customers via phone email social media and in-person inquiries monitor social media activity responding to customer comments and inquiries in a timely manner manage schedules and patients appointments ensuring smooth clinic and office operations handle patients administration and payments ensure customers have a positive experience and leave satisfied with our services coordinate and maintain office files and supplies what were looking for university degree proven experience in customer service office administration or a similar role excellent communication skills both written and verbal good negotiation and interpersonal relation skills proficiency in microsoft office suite word excel powerpoint strong multitasking and organizational skills strong attention to detail and accuracy proficiency in social media platforms ability deskripsi: key responsibilities general affair security policy developed implement update and manage all general affair and security policy to ensure both activities in each location are aligned with the procedure general affair contracts manage all ga contracts with third party including the strategy renewal and collaboration with related departments seek possibility to improve services and cost of contract services in ga corporate ga manage and optimize ga budget utilization in all locations through collaboration with hrga managers and implementation of cost efficiency strategy manage kpi achievement in each location and provide necessary support manage all corporate-wide ga activities and collaborate with each location for the implementation e g uniform procurement transportation etc observe ga activity and propose improvement on ga operational to achieve high efficiency process and services excellence organize all corporate-wide event such as sports tournament halal bi halal etc ensure company permitting and licenses is update and recorded corporate security conduct regular security assessment in both plan and surrounding area to identify potential risk and vulnerability develop and maintain relationship with local law enforcement and other related stakeholder such as community and other security professional lead investigation of security incident including work with law enforcement institution when necessary collaborate with other function within bsin to ensure all security measures are integrated into all aspect in operation stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in security management ensuring customer and stakeholder satisfaction and engagement providing briefings and reports to security staff and management maintaining operational excellence and service delivery developing strategies to prevent mitigate and respond to threats and risks e g bomb threat demonstrate theft etc managing security risk assessments and supervising incident investigations leading and monitoring the security teams performance coordinating with law enforcement government agencies vendors and other stakeholders participating in special projects related to security business continuity planning assess all ga security related risks and potential threats to the company and create business continuity planning bcp system implement bcp strategy when there are threats to the company such as natural disasters etc develop capability of ga team member to lift up skill and knowledge for sustainability of the operation
label: asli

deskripsi: job description we are seeking a customer-oriented service representative to act as a liaison provide product services information and resolve any emerging problems that our customers might face with accuracy and efficiency the target is to ensure excellent service standards respond efficiently to customer inquiries and maintain high customer satisfaction responsibilities manage incoming customer inquiries via call and email for reservation identify and assess customers needs to achieve satisfaction build sustainable relationships and trust with customer accounts through open and interactive communication provide accurate valid and complete information by using the right methods tools handle customer complaints provide appropriate solutions and alternatives within the time limits follow up to ensure resolution keep records of customer interactions process customer accounts and file documents follow communication procedures guidelines and policies requirements proven customer support experience experience as a client service representative or fresh graduated welcome to applied experience in travel consultant - frontliner - hospitality customer orientation and ability to adapt respond to different types of characters excellent communication and presentation skills in english ability to multi-task prioritize and manage time effectively high school diploma or equivalent college degree preferred proficient in microsoft office and crm software e g salesforce ability to work in a team environment benefits competitive salary fun office career path and diversity environment other benefit we cover the flight ticket to bal and provide one month of boarding house accommodation for candidates coming from outside bal

deskripsi: about the role we are seeking a dedicated organized and enthusiastic individual to manage our customer service office administration and social media activities the ideal candidate needs to be fluent or strong in communication highly organized and able to work independently while contributing to a collaborative team environment if youre passionate about providing excellent service keeping an office running smoothly and engaging with customers through social media wed love to hear from you as a customer service and office administration staff you will be responsible for a variety of key tasks that keep our company running smoothly and efficiently you will serve as the first point of contact for our patients and customers manage day-to-day office operations and engage with customer through social media this is a dynamic role that requires a proactive individual who is both organized and creative this is a great opportunity for someone with excellent communication and organizational skills a creative mindset and the ability to manage multiple responsibilities what youll be doing provide exceptional service to customers via phone email social media and in-person inquiries monitor social media activity responding to customer comments and inquiries in a timely manner manage schedules and patients appointments ensuring smooth clinic and office operations handle patients administration and payments ensure customers have a positive experience and leave satisfied with our services coordinate and maintain office files and supplies what were looking for university degree proven experience in customer service office administration or a similar role excellent communication skills both written and verbal good negotiation and interpersonal relation skills proficiency in microsoft office suite word excel powerpoint strong multitasking and organizational skills strong attention to detail and accuracy proficiency in social media platforms ability to stay calm and composed under pressure while managing multiple tasks working day is from tuesday to saturday about us orthopaedia indonesia is a leading provider of innovative orthopaedic solutions in indonesia with a focus on quality sustainability and customer satisfaction we are dedicated to improving the lives of our clients through advanced technologies and exceptional service if you are passionate about customer service and eager to contribute to the success of our dynamic organization we encourage you to apply now
label: asli

of contract services in ga corporate ga manage and optimize ga budget utilization in all locations through collaboration with hrga managers and implementation of cost efficiency strategy manage kpi achievement in each location and provide necessary support manage all corporate-wide ga activities and collaborate with each location for the implementation e g uniform procurement transportation etc deskripsi: about the role we are seeking a dedicated organized and enthusiastic individual to manage our customer service office administration and social media activities the ideal candidate needs to be fluent or strong in communication highly organized and able to work independently while contributing to a collaborative team environment if youre passionate about providing excellent service keeping an office running smoothly and engaging with customers through social media wed love to hear from you as a customer service and office administration staff you will be responsible for a variety of key tasks that keep our company running smoothly and efficiently you will serve as the first point of contact for our patients and customers manage day-to-day office operations and engage with customer through social media this is a dynamic role that requires a proactive individual who is both organized and creative this is a great opportunity for someone with excellent communication and organizational skills a creative mindset and the ability to manage multiple responsibilities what youll be doing provide exceptional service to customers via phone email social media and in-person inquiries monitor social media activity responding to customer comments and inquiries in a timely manner manage schedules and patients appointments ensuring smooth clinic and office operations handle patients administration and payments ensure customers have a positive experience and leave satisfied with our services coordinate and maintain office files and supplies what were looking for university degree proven experience in customer service office administration or a similar role excellent communication skills both written and verbal good negotiation and interpersonal relation skills proficiency in microsoft office suite word excel powerpoint strong multitasking and organizational skills strong attention to detail and accuracy proficiency in social media platforms ability to stay calm and composed under pressure while managing multiple tasks working day is from tuesday to saturday about us orthopaedia indonesia is a leading provider of innovative orthopaedic solutions in indonesia with a focus on quality sustainability and customer satisfaction we are dedicated to improving the lives of our clients through advanced technologies and exceptional service if you are passionate about customer service and eager to contribute to the success of our dynamic organization we encourage you to apply now
label: asli

of contract services in ga corporate ga manage and optimize ga budget utilization in all locations through collaboration with hrga managers and implementation of cost efficiency strategy manage kpi deskripsi: about the role we are seeking a dedicated organized and enthusiastic individual to manage our customer service office administration and social media activities the ideal candidate needs to be fluent or strong in communication highly organized and able to work independently while contributing to a collaborative team environment if youre passionate about providing excellent service keeping an office running smoothly and engaging with customers through social media wed love to hear from you as a customer service and office administration staff you will be responsible for a variety of key tasks that keep our company running smoothly and efficiently you will serve as the first point of contact for our patients and customers manage day-to-day office operations and engage with customer through social media this is a dynamic role that requires a proactive individual who is both organized and creative this is a great opportunity for someone with excellent communication and organizational skills a creative mindset and the ability to manage multiple responsibilities what youll be doing provide exceptional service to customers via phone email social media and in-person inquiries monitor social media activity responding to customer comments and inquiries in a timely manner manage schedules and patients appointments ensuring smooth clinic and office operations handle patients administration and payments ensure customers have a positive experience and leave satisfied with our services coordinate and maintain office files and supplies what were looking for university degree proven experience in customer service office administration or a similar role excellent communication skills both written and verbal good negotiation and interpersonal relation skills proficiency in microsoft office suite word excel powerpoint strong multitasking and organizational skills strong attention to detail and accuracy proficiency in social media platforms ability to stay calm and composed under pressure while managing multiple tasks working day is from tuesday to saturday about us orthopaedia indonesia is a leading provider of innovative orthopaedic solutions in indonesia with a focus on quality sustainability and customer satisfaction we are dedicated to improving the lives of our clients through advanced technologies and exceptional service if you are passionate about customer service and eager to contribute to the success of our dynamic organization we encourage you to apply now
label: asli

deskripsi: job description assist in the execution of trade marketing campaigns and promotional activities for modern trade channels maintain and update trade marketing databases reports and documentation coordinate with internal teams sales marketing finance supply chain to ensure smooth execution of trade programs collect and compile sales performance data from modern trade accounts prepare and analyze reports on promotions sales trends and competitor activities monitor and track the effectiveness of trade marketing initiatives ensure the availability and distribution of posm banners shelf talkers wobblers etc to modern trade stores maintain stock records for promotional materials and ensure timely replenishment coordinate with vendors or suppliers for posm production and delivery assist in tracking promotional budgets and expenses ensure all promotional claims and invoices are processed accurately and on time support in documentation and administrative tasks related to trade promotions act as a liaison between trade marketing sales and modern trade partners support in scheduling and coordinating meetings presentations and trade marketing events ensure alignment of trade marketing activities with sales and marketing strategies willingness to travel occasionally for store visits or trade events if required job requirements diploma or bachelors degree in business administration marketing or a related field 1-2 years of experience in administrative roles preferably in trade marketing modern trade or retail industry experience in fmcg skincare or beauty industries is a plus ability to manage multiple administrative tasks efficiently proficient in microsoft excel powerpoint and data analysis tools strong interpersonal skills for liaising with internal and external stakeholders ability to handle administrative challenges and find solutions proactively ability to work under deadlines and prioritize tasks effectively proficiency in mandarin is a plus

deskripsi: we have a vacancy in juanda international airport sub for the position of customer services officer job specifications executing day to day operational tasks to support the station and team to meet objectives handle flight operations duties including arrivals boarding gate and vip hcip monitoring whilst supervising gha team handle baggage management customer feedback investigations baggage performance invoice verification stpc vendors transportation manage ad hoc delays customer feedback and crisis management situations handle stations admin matter accountable documents stationery office equipment amenities invoice verification work permits insurance office rental generate station reports in relation to individual admin tasks and responsibilities as assigned by station manager qualifications and requirements minimum bachelors degree from reputable university fluent in english must be customer oriented and be able to supervise service partner staff effectively must be well-versed and conversant in customer handling technique traffic and cargo operations procedures general aviation knowledge possess a safety security mindset must be proactive and be able to work independently with minimal supervision must be able to write reports and handle routine correspondence with service partner airport authorities and customers must be a team player and willing to go the extra mile to ensure team dynamics and operational excellence must be willing to work in irregular hours if needed including weekend and public holiday willing to be placed in juanda international airport surabaya

deskripsi: key responsibilities general affair security policy developed implement update and manage all general affair and security policy to ensure both activities in each location are aligned with the procedure general affair contracts manage all ga contracts with third party including the strategy renewal and collaboration with related departments seek possibility to improve services and cost of contract services in ga corporate ga manage and optimize ga budget utilization in all locations through collaboration with hrga managers and implementation of cost efficiency strategy manage kpi achievement in each location and provide necessary support manage all corporate-wide ga activities and collaborate with each location for the implementation e g uniform procurement transportation etc observe ga activity and propose improvement on ga operational to achieve high efficiency process and services excellence organize all corporate-wide event such as sports tournament halal bi halal etc ensure company permitting and licenses is update and recorded corporate security conduct regular security assessment in both plan and surrounding area to identify potential risk and vulnerability develop and maintain relationship with local law enforcement and other related stakeholder such as community and other security professional lead investigation of security incident including work with law enforcement institution when necessary collaborate with other function within bsin to ensure all security measures are integrated into all aspect in operation stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in security management ensuring customer and stakeholder satisfaction and engagement providing briefings and reports to security staff and management maintaining operational excellence and service delivery developing strategies to prevent mitigate and respond to threats and risks e g bomb threat demonstrate theft etc managing security risk assessments and supervising incident investigations leading and monitoring the security teams performance coordinating with law enforcement government agencies vendors and other stakeholders participating in special projects related to security business continuity planning assess all ga security related risks and potential threats to the company and create business continuity planning bcp system implement bcp strategy when there are threats to the company such as natural disasters etc develop capability of ga team member to lift up skill and knowledge for sustainability of the operation

the procedure general affair contracts manage all ga contracts with third party including the strategy renewal and collaboration with related departments seek possibility to improve services and cost of contract services in ga corporate ga manage and optimize ga budget utilization in all locations through collaboration with hrga managers and implementation of cost efficiency strategy manage kpi achievement in each location and provide necessary support manage all corporate-wide ga activities and collaborate with each location for the implementation e g uniform procurement transportation etc observe ga activity and propose improvement on ga operational to achieve high efficiency process and services excellence organize all corporate-wide event such as sports tournament halal bi halal etc ensure company permitting and licenses is update and recorded corporate security conduct regular security assessment in both plan and surrounding area to identify potential risk and vulnerability develop and maintain relationship with local law enforcement and other related stakeholder such as community and other security professional lead investigation of security incident including work with law enforcement institution when necessary collaborate with other function within bsin to ensure all security measures are integrated into all aspect in operation stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in security management ensuring customer and stakeholder satisfaction and engagement providing briefings and reports to security staff and management maintaining operational excellence and service delivery developing strategies to prevent mitigate and respond to threats and risks e g bomb threat demonstrate theft etc managing security risk assessments and supervising incident investigations leading and monitoring the security teams performance coordinating with law enforcement government agencies vendors and other stakeholders participating in special projects related to security business continuity planning assess all ga security related risks and potential threats to the company and create business continuity planning bcp system implement bcp strategy deskripsi: about the role we are seeking a dedicated organized and enthusiastic individual to manage our customer service office administration and social media activities the ideal candidate needs to be fluent or strong in communication highly organized and able to work independently while contributing to a collaborative team environment if youre passionate about providing excellent service keeping an office running smoothly and engaging with customers through social media wed love to hear from you as a customer service and office administration staff you will be responsible for a variety of key tasks that keep our company running smoothly and efficiently you will serve as the first point of contact for our patients and customers manage day-to-day office operations and engage with customer through social media this is a dynamic role that requires a proactive individual who is both organized and creative this is a great opportunity for someone with excellent communication and organizational skills a creative mindset and the ability to manage multiple responsibilities what youll be doing provide exceptional service to customers via phone email social media and in-person inquiries monitor social media activity responding to customer comments and inquiries in a timely manner manage schedules and patients appointments ensuring smooth clinic and office operations handle patients administration and payments ensure customers have a positive experience and leave satisfied with our services coordinate and maintain office files and supplies what were looking for university degree proven experience in customer service office administration or a similar role excellent communication skills both written and verbal good negotiation and interpersonal relation skills proficiency in microsoft office suite word excel powerpoint strong multitasking and organizational skills strong attention to detail and accuracy proficiency in social media platforms ability to stay calm and composed under pressure while managing multiple tasks working day is from tuesday to saturday about us orthopaedia indonesia is a leading provider of innovative orthopaedic solutions in indonesia with a focus on quality sustainability and customer satisfaction we are dedicated to improving the lives of our clients through advanced technologies and exceptional service if you are passionate about customer service and eager to contribute to the success of our dynamic organization we encourage you to apply now
label: asli

deskripsi: we have a vacancy in juanda international airport sub for the position of customer services officer job specifications executing day to day operational tasks to support the station and team to meet objectives handle flight operations duties including arrivals boarding gate and vip hcip monitoring whilst supervising gha team handle baggage management customer feedback investigations baggage performance invoice verification stpc vendors transportation manage ad hoc delays customer feedback and crisis management situations handle stations admin matter accountable documents stationery office equipment amenities invoice verification work permits insurance office rental generate station reports in relation to individual admin tasks and responsibilities as assigned by station manager qualifications and requirements minimum bachelors degree from reputable university fluent in english must be customer oriented and be able to supervise service partner staff effectively must be well-versed and conversant in customer handling technique traffic and cargo operations procedures general aviation knowledge possess a safety security mindset must be proactive and be able to work independently with minimal supervision must be able to write reports and handle routine correspondence with service partner airport authorities and customers must be a team player and willing to go the extra mile to ensure team dynamics and operational excellence must be willing to work in irregular hours if needed including weekend and public holiday willing to be placed in juanda international airport surabaya
label: asli

deskripsi: key responsibilities general affair security policy developed implement update and manage all general affair and security policy to ensure both activities in each location are aligned with the procedure general affair contracts manage all ga contracts with third party including the strategy renewal and collaboration with related departments seek possibility to improve services and cost of contract services in ga corporate ga manage and optimize ga budget utilization in all locations through collaboration with hrga managers and implementation of cost efficiency strategy manage kpi achievement in each location and provide necessary support manage all corporate-wide ga activities and collaborate with each location for the implementation e g uniform procurement transportation etc observe ga activity and propose improvement on ga operational to achieve high efficiency process and services excellence organize all corporate-wide event such as sports tournament halal bi halal etc ensure company permitting and licenses is update and recorded corporate security conduct regular security assessment in both plan and surrounding area to identify potential risk and vulnerability develop and maintain relationship with local law enforcement and other related stakeholder such as community and other security professional lead investigation of security incident including work with law enforcement institution when necessary collaborate with other function within bsin to ensure all security measures are integrated into all aspect in operation stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in security management ensuring customer and stakeholder satisfaction and engagement providing briefings and reports to security staff and management maintaining operational excellence and service delivery developing strategies to prevent mitigate and respond to threats and risks e g bomb threat demonstrate theft etc managing security risk assessments and supervising incident investigations leading and monitoring the security teams performance coordinating with law enforcement government agencies vendors and other stakeholders participating in special projects related to security business continuity planning assess all ga security related risks and potential threats to the company and create business continuity planning bcp system implement bcp strategy when there are threats to the company such as natural disasters etc develop capability of ga team member to lift up skill and knowledge for sustainability of the operation

deskripsi: about the role we are seeking a dedicated organized and enthusiastic individual to manage our customer service office administration and social media activities the ideal candidate needs to be fluent or strong in communication highly organized and able to work independently while contributing to a collaborative team environment if youre passionate about providing excellent service keeping an office running smoothly and engaging with customers through social media wed love to hear from you as a customer service and office administration staff you will be responsible for a variety of key tasks that keep our company running smoothly and efficiently you will serve as the first point of contact for our patients and customers manage day-to-day office operations and engage with customer through social media this is a dynamic role that requires a proactive individual who is both organized and creative this is a great opportunity for someone with excellent communication and organizational skills a creative mindset and the ability to manage multiple responsibilities what youll be doing provide exceptional service to customers via phone email social media and in-person inquiries monitor social media activity responding to customer comments and inquiries in a timely manner manage schedules and patients appointments ensuring smooth clinic and office operations handle patients administration and payments ensure customers have a positive experience and leave satisfied with our services coordinate and maintain office files and supplies what were looking for university degree proven experience in customer service office administration or a similar role excellent communication skills both written and verbal good negotiation and interpersonal relation skills proficiency in microsoft office suite word excel powerpoint strong multitasking and organizational skills strong attention to detail and accuracy proficiency in social media platforms ability to stay calm and composed under pressure while managing multiple tasks working day is from tuesday to saturday about us orthopaedia indonesia is a leading provider of innovative orthopaedic solutions in indonesia with a focus on quality sustainability and customer satisfaction we are dedicated to improving the lives of our clients through advanced technologies and exceptional service if you are passionate about customer service and eager to contribute to the success of our dynamic organization we encourage you to apply now

deskripsi: we have a vacancy in juanda international airport sub for the position of customer services officer job specifications executing day to day operational tasks to support the station and team to meet objectives handle flight operations duties including arrivals boarding gate and vip hcip monitoring whilst supervising gha team handle baggage management customer feedback investigations baggage performance invoice verification stpc vendors transportation manage ad hoc delays customer feedback and crisis management situations handle stations admin matter accountable documents stationery office equipment amenities invoice verification work permits insurance office rental generate station reports in relation to individual admin tasks and responsibilities as assigned by station manager qualifications and requirements minimum bachelors degree from reputable university fluent in english must be customer oriented and be able to supervise service partner staff effectively must be well-versed and conversant in customer handling technique traffic and cargo operations procedures general aviation knowledge possess a safety security mindset must be proactive and be able to work independently with minimal supervision must be able to write reports and handle routine correspondence with service partner airport authorities and customers must be a team player and willing to go the extra mile to ensure team dynamics and operational excellence must be willing to work in irregular hours if needed including weekend and public holiday willing to be placed in juanda international airport surabaya

the procedure general affair contracts manage all ga contracts with third party including the strategy renewal and collaboration with related departments seek possibility to improve services and cost of contract services in ga corporate ga manage and optimize ga budget utilization in all locations through collaboration with hrga managers and implementation of cost efficiency strategy manage kpi achievement in each location and provide necessary support manage all corporate-wide ga activities and collaborate with each location for the implementation e g uniform procurement transportation etc observe ga activity and propose improvement on ga operational to achieve high efficiency process and services excellence organize all corporate-wide event such as sports tournament halal bi halal etc ensure company permitting and licenses is update and recorded corporate security conduct regular security assessment in both plan and surrounding area to identify potential risk and vulnerability develop and maintain relationship with local law enforcement and other related stakeholder such as community and other security professional lead investigation of security incident including work with law enforcement institution when necessary collaborate with other function within bsin to ensure all security measures are integrated into all aspect in operation stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in security management ensuring customer and stakeholder satisfaction and engagement providing briefings and reports to security staff and management maintaining operational excellence and service delivery developing strategies to prevent mitigate and respond to threats and risks e g bomb threat demonstrate theft etc managing security risk assessments and supervising incident investigations leading and monitoring the security teams performance coordinating with law enforcement government agencies vendors and other stakeholders participating in special projects related to security business continuity planning assess all ga security related risks and potential threats to the company and create business continuity planning bcp system implement bcp strategy deskripsi: about the role we are seeking a dedicated organized and enthusiastic individual to manage our customer service office administration and social media activities the ideal candidate needs to be fluent or strong in communication highly organized and able to work independently while contributing to a collaborative team environment if youre passionate about providing excellent service keeping an office running smoothly and engaging with customers through social media wed love to hear from you as a customer service and office administration staff you will be responsible for a variety of key tasks that keep our company running smoothly and efficiently you will serve as the first point of contact for our patients and customers manage day-to-day office operations and engage with customer through social media this is a dynamic role that requires a proactive individual who is both organized and creative this is a great opportunity for someone with excellent communication and organizational skills a creative mindset and the ability to manage multiple responsibilities what youll be doing provide exceptional service to customers via phone email social media and in-person inquiries monitor social media activity responding to customer comments and inquiries in a timely manner manage schedules and patients appointments ensuring smooth clinic and office operations handle patients administration and payments ensure customers have a positive experience and leave satisfied with our services coordinate and maintain office files and supplies what were looking for university degree proven experience in customer service office administration or a similar role excellent communication skills both written and verbal good negotiation and interpersonal relation skills proficiency in microsoft office suite word excel powerpoint strong multitasking and organizational skills strong attention to detail and accuracy proficiency in social media platforms ability deskripsi: key responsibilities general affair security policy developed implement update and manage all general affair and security policy to ensure both activities in each location are aligned with the procedure general affair contracts manage all ga contracts with third party including the strategy renewal and collaboration with related departments seek possibility to improve services and cost of contract services in ga corporate ga manage and optimize ga budget utilization in all locations through collaboration with hrga managers and implementation of cost efficiency strategy manage kpi achievement in each location and provide necessary support manage all corporate-wide ga activities and collaborate with each location for the implementation e g uniform procurement transportation etc observe ga activity and propose improvement on ga operational to achieve high efficiency process and services excellence organize all corporate-wide event such as sports tournament halal bi halal etc ensure company permitting and licenses is update and recorded corporate security conduct regular security assessment in both plan and surrounding area to identify potential risk and vulnerability develop and maintain relationship with local law enforcement and other related stakeholder such as community and other security professional lead investigation of security incident including work with law enforcement institution when necessary collaborate with other function within bsin to ensure all security measures are integrated into all aspect in operation stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in security management ensuring customer and stakeholder satisfaction and engagement providing briefings and reports to security staff and management maintaining operational excellence and service delivery developing strategies to prevent mitigate and respond to threats and risks e g bomb threat demonstrate theft etc managing security risk assessments and supervising incident investigations leading and monitoring the security teams performance coordinating with law enforcement government agencies vendors and other stakeholders participating in special projects related to security business continuity planning assess all ga security related risks and potential threats to the company and create business continuity planning bcp system implement bcp strategy when there are threats to the company such as natural disasters etc develop capability of ga team member to lift up skill and knowledge for sustainability of the operation

deskripsi: about the role we are seeking a dedicated organized and enthusiastic individual to manage our customer service office administration and social media activities the ideal candidate needs to be fluent or strong in communication highly organized and able to work independently while contributing to a collaborative team environment if youre passionate about providing excellent service keeping an office running smoothly and engaging with customers through social media wed love to hear from you as a customer service and office administration staff you will be responsible for a variety of key tasks that keep our company running smoothly and efficiently you will serve as the first point of contact for our patients and customers manage day-to-day office operations and engage with customer through social media this is a dynamic role that requires a proactive individual who is both organized and creative this is a great opportunity for someone with excellent communication and organizational skills a creative mindset and the ability to manage multiple responsibilities what youll be doing provide exceptional service to customers via phone email social media and in-person inquiries monitor social media activity responding to customer comments and inquiries in a timely manner manage schedules and patients appointments ensuring smooth clinic and office operations handle patients administration and payments ensure customers have a positive experience and leave satisfied with our services coordinate and maintain office files and supplies what were looking for university degree proven experience in customer service office administration or a similar role excellent communication skills both written and verbal good negotiation and interpersonal relation skills proficiency in microsoft office suite word excel powerpoint strong multitasking and organizational skills strong attention to detail and accuracy proficiency in social media platforms ability to stay calm and composed under pressure while managing multiple tasks working day is from tuesday to saturday about us orthopaedia indonesia is a leading provider of innovative orthopaedic solutions in indonesia with a focus on quality sustainability and customer satisfaction we are dedicated to improving the lives of our clients through advanced technologies and exceptional service if you are passionate about customer service and eager to contribute to the success of our dynamic organization we encourage you to apply now
label: asli

deskripsi: job description assist in the execution of trade marketing campaigns and promotional activities for modern trade channels maintain and update trade marketing databases reports and documentation coordinate with internal teams sales marketing finance supply chain to ensure smooth execution of trade programs collect and compile sales performance data from modern trade accounts prepare and analyze reports on promotions sales trends and competitor activities monitor and track the effectiveness of trade marketing initiatives ensure the availability and distribution of posm banners shelf talkers wobblers etc to modern trade stores maintain stock records for promotional materials and ensure timely replenishment coordinate with vendors or suppliers for posm production and delivery assist in tracking promotional budgets and expenses ensure all promotional claims and invoices are processed accurately and on time support in documentation and administrative tasks related to trade promotions act as a liaison between trade marketing sales and modern trade partners support in scheduling and coordinating meetings presentations and trade marketing events ensure alignment of trade marketing activities with sales and marketing strategies willingness to travel occasionally for store visits or trade events if required job requirements diploma or bachelors degree in business administration marketing or a related field 1-2 years of experience in administrative roles preferably in trade marketing modern trade or retail industry experience in fmcg skincare or beauty industries is a plus ability to manage multiple administrative tasks efficiently proficient in microsoft excel powerpoint and data analysis tools strong interpersonal skills for liaising with internal and external stakeholders ability to handle administrative challenges and find solutions proactively ability to work under deadlines and prioritize tasks effectively proficiency in mandarin is a plus
label: asli

deskripsi: we have a vacancy in juanda international airport sub for the position of customer services officer job specifications executing day to day operational tasks to support the station and team to meet objectives handle flight operations duties including arrivals boarding gate and vip hcip monitoring whilst supervising gha team handle baggage management customer feedback investigations baggage performance invoice verification stpc vendors transportation manage ad hoc delays customer feedback and crisis management situations handle stations admin matter accountable documents stationery office equipment amenities invoice verification work permits insurance office rental generate station reports in relation to individual admin tasks and responsibilities as assigned by station manager qualifications and requirements minimum bachelors degree from reputable university fluent in english must be customer oriented and be able to supervise service partner staff effectively must be well-versed and conversant in customer handling technique traffic and cargo operations procedures general aviation knowledge possess a safety security mindset must be proactive and be able to work independently with minimal supervision must be able to write reports and handle routine correspondence with service partner airport authorities and customers must be a team player and willing to go the extra mile to ensure team dynamics and operational excellence must be willing to work in irregular hours if needed including weekend and public holiday willing to be placed in juanda international airport surabaya
label: asli

deskripsi: job desc  - drafting and reviewing all types of agreements whether standardized or non-standardized to support the companys routine operational activities including preparing memorandums powers of attorney and other legal instruments required for contract execution - preparing board of directors board of commissioners meeting resolutions extraordinary annual general meeting of shareholders gms documents circular resolutions of shareholders amendments to the articles of association changes in directors or board of commissioners members and other necessary documents - maintaining good communication with the companys stakeholders regarding the drafting of deeds and agreements required by the company - conducting legal research and preparing legal memorandums which may include summaries legal due diligence or other analyses based on the companys needs - organizing and maintaining the filing of documents within the legal corporate secretary department - performing other tasks as required by the company requirements  - bachelors degree in law - minimum 1-3 years of work experience in a relevant field related to the required job responsibilities - experience in contract drafting legal drafting and litigation if necessary - strong communication and negotiation skills - detail-oriented and meticulous
label: asli

deskripsi: key responsibilities general affair security policy developed implement update and manage all general affair and security policy to ensure both activities in each location are aligned with the procedure general affair contracts manage all ga contracts with third party including the strategy renewal and collaboration with related departments seek possibility to improve services and cost of contract services in ga corporate ga manage and optimize ga budget utilization in all locations through collaboration with hrga managers and implementation of cost efficiency strategy manage kpi achievement in each location and provide necessary support manage all corporate-wide ga activities and collaborate with each location for the implementation e g uniform procurement transportation etc observe ga activity and propose improvement on ga operational to achieve high efficiency process and services excellence organize all corporate-wide event such as sports tournament halal bi halal etc ensure company permitting and licenses is update and recorded corporate security conduct regular security assessment in both plan and surrounding area to identify potential risk and vulnerability develop and maintain relationship with local law enforcement and other related stakeholder such as community and other security professional lead investigation of security incident including work with law enforcement institution when necessary collaborate with other function within bsin to ensure all security measures are integrated into all aspect in operation stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in security management ensuring customer and stakeholder satisfaction and engagement providing briefings and reports to security staff and management maintaining operational excellence and service delivery developing strategies to prevent mitigate and respond to threats and risks e g bomb threat demonstrate theft etc managing security risk assessments and supervising incident investigations leading and monitoring the security teams performance coordinating with law enforcement government agencies vendors and other stakeholders participating in special projects related to security business continuity planning assess all ga security related risks and potential threats to the company and create business continuity planning bcp system implement bcp strategy when there are threats to the company such as natural disasters etc develop capability of ga team member to lift up skill and knowledge for sustainability of the operation
label: asli

observe ga activity and propose improvement on ga operational to achieve high efficiency process and services excellence organize all corporate-wide event such as sports tournament halal bi halal etc deskripsi: about the role we are seeking a dedicated organized and enthusiastic individual to manage our customer service office administration and social media activities the ideal candidate needs to be fluent or strong in communication highly organized and able to work independently while contributing to a collaborative team environment if youre passionate about providing excellent service keeping an office running smoothly and engaging with customers through social media wed love to hear from you as a customer service and office administration staff you will be responsible for a variety of key tasks that keep our company running smoothly and efficiently you will serve as the first point of contact for our patients and customers manage day-to-day office operations and engage with customer through social media this is a dynamic role that requires a proactive individual who is both organized and creative this is a great opportunity for someone with excellent communication and organizational skills a creative mindset and the ability to manage multiple responsibilities what youll be doing provide exceptional service to customers via phone email social media and in-person inquiries monitor social media activity responding to customer comments and inquiries in a timely manner manage schedules and patients appointments ensuring smooth clinic and office operations handle patients administration and payments ensure customers have a positive experience and leave satisfied with our services coordinate and maintain office files and supplies what were looking for university degree proven experience in customer service office administration or a similar role excellent communication skills both written and verbal good negotiation and interpersonal relation skills proficiency in microsoft office suite word excel powerpoint strong multitasking and organizational skills strong attention to detail and accuracy proficiency in social media platforms ability to stay calm and composed under pressure while managing multiple tasks working day is from tuesday to saturday about us orthopaedia indonesia is a leading provider of innovative orthopaedic solutions in indonesia with a focus on quality sustainability and customer satisfaction we are dedicated to improving the lives of our clients through advanced technologies and exceptional service if you are deskripsi: job description assist in the execution of trade marketing campaigns and promotional activities for modern trade channels maintain and update trade marketing databases reports and documentation coordinate with internal teams sales marketing finance supply chain to ensure smooth execution of trade programs collect and compile sales performance data from modern trade accounts prepare and analyze reports on promotions sales trends and competitor activities monitor and track the effectiveness of trade marketing initiatives ensure the availability and distribution of posm banners shelf talkers wobblers etc to modern trade stores maintain stock records for promotional materials and ensure timely replenishment coordinate with vendors or suppliers for posm production and delivery assist in tracking promotional budgets and expenses ensure all promotional claims and invoices are processed accurately and on time support in documentation and administrative tasks related to trade promotions act as a liaison between trade marketing sales and modern trade partners support in scheduling and coordinating meetings presentations and trade marketing events ensure alignment of trade marketing activities with sales and marketing strategies willingness to travel occasionally for store visits or trade events if required job requirements diploma or bachelors degree in business administration marketing or a related field 1-2 years of experience in administrative roles preferably in trade marketing modern trade or retail industry experience in fmcg skincare or beauty industries is a plus ability to manage multiple administrative tasks efficiently proficient in microsoft excel powerpoint and data analysis tools strong interpersonal skills for liaising with internal and external stakeholders ability to handle administrative challenges and find solutions proactively ability to work under deadlines and prioritize tasks effectively proficiency in mandarin is a plus

deskripsi: about the role we are seeking a dedicated organized and enthusiastic individual to manage our customer service office administration and social media activities the ideal candidate needs to be fluent or strong in communication highly organized and able to work independently while contributing to a collaborative team environment if youre passionate about providing excellent service keeping an office running smoothly and engaging with customers through social media wed love to hear from you as a customer service and office administration staff you will be responsible for a variety of key tasks that keep our company running smoothly and efficiently you will serve as the first point of contact for our patients and customers manage day-to-day office operations and engage with customer through social media this is a dynamic role that requires a proactive individual who is both organized and creative this is a great opportunity for someone with excellent communication and organizational skills a creative mindset and the ability to manage multiple responsibilities what youll be doing provide exceptional service to customers via phone email social media and in-person inquiries monitor social media activity responding to customer comments and inquiries in a timely manner manage schedules and patients appointments ensuring smooth clinic and office operations handle patients administration and payments ensure customers have a positive experience and leave satisfied with our services coordinate and maintain office files and supplies what were looking for university degree proven experience in customer service office administration or a similar role excellent communication skills both written and verbal good negotiation and interpersonal relation skills proficiency in microsoft office suite word excel powerpoint strong multitasking and organizational skills strong attention to detail and accuracy proficiency in social media platforms ability to stay calm and composed under pressure while managing multiple tasks working day is from tuesday to saturday about us orthopaedia indonesia is a leading provider of innovative orthopaedic solutions in indonesia with a focus on quality sustainability and customer satisfaction we are dedicated to improving the lives of our clients through advanced technologies and exceptional service if you are passionate about customer service and eager to contribute to the success of our dynamic organization we encourage you to apply now
label: asli

or batam deliveree is seeking ambitious hard working and career-focused candidates who have recently received their undergraduate degree from a recognized university in indonesia or abroad all majors marketing operational excellence supply chain management booking operations fleet training fleet recruiting telemarketing finance human resources and administration you are encouraged to rotate to new deskripsi: about the role we are seeking a dedicated organized and enthusiastic individual to manage our customer service office administration and social media activities the ideal candidate needs to be fluent or strong in communication highly organized and able to work independently while contributing to a collaborative team environment if youre passionate about providing excellent service keeping an office running smoothly and engaging with customers through social media wed love to hear from you as a customer service and office administration staff you will be responsible for a variety of key tasks that keep our company running smoothly and efficiently you will serve as the first point of contact for our patients and customers manage day-to-day office operations and engage with customer through social media this is a dynamic role that requires a proactive individual who is both organized and creative this is a great opportunity for someone with excellent communication and organizational skills a creative mindset and the ability to manage multiple responsibilities what youll be doing provide exceptional service to customers via phone email social media and in-person inquiries monitor social media activity responding to customer comments and inquiries in a timely manner manage schedules and patients appointments ensuring smooth clinic and office operations handle patients administration and payments ensure customers have a positive experience and leave satisfied with our services coordinate and maintain office files and supplies what were looking for university degree proven experience in customer service office administration or a similar role excellent communication skills both written and verbal good negotiation and interpersonal relation skills proficiency in microsoft office suite word excel powerpoint strong multitasking and organizational skills strong attention to detail and accuracy proficiency in social media platforms ability to stay calm and composed under pressure while managing multiple tasks working day is from tuesday to saturday about us orthopaedia indonesia is a leading provider of innovative orthopaedic solutions in indonesia with a focus on quality sustainability and customer satisfaction we are dedicated to improving the lives of our clients through advanced technologies and exceptional service if you are passionate about customer service and eager to contribute to the success of our dynamic organization we encourage you to apply now
label: asli

deskripsi: key responsibilities general affair security policy developed implement update and manage all general affair and security policy to ensure both activities in each location are aligned with the procedure general affair contracts manage all ga contracts with third party including the strategy renewal and collaboration with related departments seek possibility to improve services and cost of contract services in ga corporate ga manage and optimize ga budget utilization in all locations through collaboration with hrga managers and implementation of cost efficiency strategy manage kpi achievement in each location and provide necessary support manage all corporate-wide ga activities and collaborate with each location for the implementation e g uniform procurement transportation etc observe ga activity and propose improvement on ga operational to achieve high efficiency process and services excellence organize all corporate-wide event such as sports tournament halal bi halal etc ensure company permitting and licenses is update and recorded corporate security conduct regular security assessment in both plan and surrounding area to identify potential risk and vulnerability develop and maintain relationship with local law enforcement and other related stakeholder such as community and other security professional lead investigation of security incident including work with law enforcement institution when necessary collaborate with other function within bsin to ensure all security measures are integrated into all aspect in operation stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in security management ensuring customer and stakeholder satisfaction and engagement providing briefings and reports to security staff and management maintaining operational excellence and service delivery developing strategies to prevent mitigate and respond to threats and risks e g bomb threat demonstrate theft etc managing security risk assessments and supervising incident investigations leading and monitoring the security teams performance coordinating with law enforcement government agencies vendors and other stakeholders participating in special projects related to security business continuity planning assess all ga security related risks and potential threats to the company and create business continuity planning bcp system implement bcp strategy when there are threats to the company such as natural disasters etc develop capability of ga team member to lift up skill and knowledge for sustainability of the operation

deskripsi: key responsibilities general affair security policy developed implement update and manage all general affair and security policy to ensure both activities in each location are aligned with the procedure general affair contracts manage all ga contracts with third party including the strategy renewal and collaboration with related departments seek possibility to improve services and cost of contract services in ga corporate ga manage and optimize ga budget utilization in all locations through collaboration with hrga managers and implementation of cost efficiency strategy manage kpi achievement in each location and provide necessary support manage all corporate-wide ga activities and collaborate with each location for the implementation e g uniform procurement transportation etc observe ga activity and propose improvement on ga operational to achieve high efficiency process and services excellence organize all corporate-wide event such as sports tournament halal bi halal etc ensure company permitting and licenses is update and recorded corporate security conduct regular security assessment in both plan and surrounding area to identify potential risk and vulnerability develop and maintain relationship with local law enforcement and other related stakeholder such as community and other security professional lead investigation of security incident including work with law enforcement institution when necessary collaborate with other function within bsin to ensure all security measures are integrated into all aspect in operation stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in security management ensuring customer and stakeholder satisfaction and engagement providing briefings and reports to security staff and management maintaining operational excellence and service delivery developing strategies to prevent mitigate and respond to threats and risks e g bomb threat demonstrate theft etc managing security risk assessments and supervising incident investigations leading and monitoring the security teams performance coordinating with law enforcement government agencies vendors and other stakeholders participating in special projects related to security business continuity planning assess all ga security related risks and potential threats to the company and create business continuity planning bcp system implement bcp strategy when there are threats to the company such as natural disasters etc develop capability of ga team member to lift up skill and knowledge for sustainability of the operation

deskripsi: key responsibilities general affair security policy developed implement update and manage all general affair and security policy to ensure both activities in each location are aligned with the procedure general affair contracts manage all ga contracts with third party including the strategy renewal and collaboration with related departments seek possibility to improve services and cost of contract services in ga corporate ga manage and optimize ga budget utilization in all locations through collaboration with hrga managers and implementation of cost efficiency strategy manage kpi achievement in each location and provide necessary support manage all corporate-wide ga activities and collaborate with each location for the implementation e g uniform procurement transportation etc observe ga activity and propose improvement on ga operational to achieve high efficiency process and services excellence organize all corporate-wide event such as sports tournament halal bi halal etc ensure company permitting and licenses is update and recorded corporate security conduct regular security assessment in both plan and surrounding area to identify potential risk and vulnerability develop and maintain relationship with local law enforcement and other related stakeholder such as community and other security professional lead investigation of security incident including work with law enforcement institution when necessary collaborate with other function within bsin to ensure all security measures are integrated into all aspect in operation stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in security management ensuring customer and stakeholder satisfaction and engagement providing briefings and reports to security staff and management maintaining operational excellence and service delivery developing strategies to prevent mitigate and respond to threats and risks e g bomb threat demonstrate theft etc managing security risk assessments and supervising incident investigations leading and monitoring the security teams performance coordinating with law enforcement government agencies vendors and other stakeholders participating in special projects related to security business continuity planning assess all ga security related risks and potential threats to the company and create business continuity planning bcp system implement bcp strategy when there are threats to the company such as natural disasters etc develop capability of ga team member to lift up skill and knowledge for sustainability of the operation

deskripsi: about the role we are seeking a dedicated organized and enthusiastic individual to manage our customer service office administration and social media activities the ideal candidate needs to be fluent or strong in communication highly organized and able to work independently while contributing to a collaborative team environment if youre passionate about providing excellent service keeping an office running smoothly and engaging with customers through social media wed love to hear from you as a customer service and office administration staff you will be responsible for a variety of key tasks that keep our company running smoothly and efficiently you will serve as the first point of contact for our patients and customers manage day-to-day office operations and engage with customer through social media this is a dynamic role that requires a proactive individual who is both organized and creative this is a great opportunity for someone with excellent communication and organizational skills a creative mindset and the ability to manage multiple responsibilities what youll be doing provide exceptional service to customers via phone email social media and in-person inquiries monitor social media activity responding to customer comments and inquiries in a timely manner manage schedules and patients appointments ensuring smooth clinic and office operations handle patients administration and payments ensure customers have a positive experience and leave satisfied with our services coordinate and maintain office files and supplies what were looking for university degree proven experience in customer service office administration or a similar role excellent communication skills both written and verbal good negotiation and interpersonal relation skills proficiency in microsoft office suite word excel powerpoint strong multitasking and organizational skills strong attention to detail and accuracy proficiency in social media platforms ability to stay calm and composed under pressure while managing multiple tasks working day is from tuesday to saturday about us orthopaedia indonesia is a leading provider of innovative orthopaedic solutions in indonesia with a focus on quality sustainability and customer satisfaction we are dedicated to improving the lives of our clients through advanced technologies and exceptional service if you are passionate about customer service and eager to contribute to the success of our dynamic organization we encourage you to apply now
label: asli

deskripsi: job description assist in the execution of trade marketing campaigns and promotional activities for modern trade channels maintain and update trade marketing databases reports and documentation coordinate with internal teams sales marketing finance supply chain to ensure smooth execution of trade programs collect and compile sales performance data from modern trade accounts prepare and analyze reports on promotions sales trends and competitor activities monitor and track the effectiveness of trade marketing initiatives ensure the availability and distribution of posm banners shelf talkers wobblers etc to modern trade stores maintain stock records for promotional materials and ensure timely replenishment coordinate with vendors or suppliers for posm production and delivery assist in tracking promotional budgets and expenses ensure all promotional claims and invoices are processed accurately and on time support in documentation and administrative tasks related to trade promotions act as a liaison between trade marketing sales and modern trade partners support in scheduling and coordinating meetings presentations and trade marketing events ensure alignment of trade marketing activities with sales and marketing strategies willingness to travel occasionally for store visits or trade events if required job requirements diploma or bachelors degree in business administration marketing or a related field 1-2 years of experience in administrative roles preferably in trade marketing modern trade or retail industry experience in fmcg skincare or beauty industries is a plus ability to manage multiple administrative tasks efficiently proficient in microsoft excel powerpoint and data analysis tools strong interpersonal skills for liaising with internal and external stakeholders ability to handle administrative challenges and find solutions proactively ability to work under deadlines and prioritize tasks effectively proficiency in mandarin is a plus
label: asli
