deskripsi: we have a vacancy in juanda international airport sub for the position of customer services officer job specifications executing day to day operational tasks to support the station and team to meet objectives handle flight operations duties including arrivals boarding gate and vip hcip monitoring whilst supervising gha team handle baggage management customer feedback investigations baggage performance invoice verification stpc vendors transportation manage ad hoc delays customer feedback and crisis management situations handle stations admin matter accountable documents stationery office equipment amenities invoice verification work permits insurance office rental generate station reports in relation to individual admin tasks and responsibilities as assigned by station manager qualifications and requirements minimum bachelors degree from reputable university fluent in english must be customer oriented and be able to supervise service partner staff effectively must be well-versed and conversant in customer handling technique traffic and cargo operations procedures general aviation knowledge possess a safety security mindset must be proactive and be able to work independently with minimal supervision must be able to write reports and handle routine correspondence with service partner airport authorities and customers must be a team player and willing to go the extra mile to ensure team dynamics and operational excellence must be willing to work in irregular hours if needed including weekend and public holiday willing to be placed in juanda international airport surabaya
label: asli

deskripsi: key responsibilities general affair security policy developed implement update and manage all general affair and security policy to ensure both activities in each location are aligned with the procedure general affair contracts manage all ga contracts with third party including the strategy renewal and collaboration with related departments seek possibility to improve services and cost of contract services in ga corporate ga manage and optimize ga budget utilization in all locations through collaboration with hrga managers and implementation of cost efficiency strategy manage kpi achievement in each location and provide necessary support manage all corporate-wide ga activities and collaborate with each location for the implementation e g uniform procurement transportation etc observe ga activity and propose improvement on ga operational to achieve high efficiency process and services excellence organize all corporate-wide event such as sports tournament halal bi halal etc ensure company permitting and licenses is update and recorded corporate security conduct regular security assessment in both plan and surrounding area to identify potential risk and vulnerability develop and maintain relationship with local law enforcement and other related stakeholder such as community and other security professional lead investigation of security incident including work with law enforcement institution when necessary collaborate with other function within bsin to ensure all security measures are integrated into all aspect in operation stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in security management ensuring customer and stakeholder satisfaction and engagement providing briefings and reports to security staff and management maintaining operational excellence and service delivery developing strategies to prevent mitigate and respond to threats and risks e g bomb threat demonstrate theft etc managing security risk assessments and supervising incident investigations leading and monitoring the security teams performance coordinating with law enforcement government agencies vendors and other stakeholders participating in special projects related to security business continuity planning assess all ga security related risks and potential threats to the company and create business continuity planning bcp system implement bcp strategy when there are threats to the company such as natural disasters etc develop capability of ga team member to lift up skill and knowledge for sustainability of the operation
label: asli

deskripsi: key responsibilities general affair security policy developed implement update and manage all general affair and security policy to ensure both activities in each location are aligned with the procedure general affair contracts manage all ga contracts with third party including the strategy renewal and collaboration with related departments seek possibility to improve services and cost of contract services in ga corporate ga manage and optimize ga budget utilization in all locations through collaboration with hrga managers and implementation of cost efficiency strategy manage kpi achievement in each location and provide necessary support manage all corporate-wide ga activities and collaborate with each location for the implementation e g uniform procurement transportation etc observe ga activity and propose improvement on ga operational to achieve high efficiency process and services excellence organize all corporate-wide event such as sports tournament halal bi halal etc ensure company permitting and licenses is update and recorded corporate security conduct regular security assessment in both plan and surrounding area to identify potential risk and vulnerability develop and maintain relationship with local law enforcement and other related stakeholder such as community and other security professional lead investigation of security incident including work with law enforcement institution when necessary collaborate with other function within bsin to ensure all security measures are integrated into all aspect in operation stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in security management ensuring customer and stakeholder satisfaction and engagement providing briefings and reports to security staff and management maintaining operational excellence and service delivery developing strategies to prevent mitigate and respond to threats and risks e g bomb threat demonstrate theft etc managing security risk assessments and supervising incident investigations leading and monitoring the security teams performance coordinating with law enforcement government agencies vendors and other stakeholders participating in special projects related to security business continuity planning assess all ga security related risks and potential threats to the company and create business continuity planning bcp system implement bcp strategy when there are threats to the company such as natural disasters etc develop capability of ga team member to lift up skill and knowledge for sustainability of the operation

deskripsi: key responsibilities general affair security policy developed implement update and manage all general affair and security policy to ensure both activities in each location are aligned with the procedure general affair contracts manage all ga contracts with third party including the strategy renewal and collaboration with related departments seek possibility to improve services and cost of contract services in ga corporate ga manage and optimize ga budget utilization in all locations through collaboration with hrga managers and implementation of cost efficiency strategy manage kpi achievement in each location and provide necessary support manage all corporate-wide ga activities and collaborate with each location for the implementation e g uniform procurement transportation etc observe ga activity and propose improvement on ga operational to achieve high efficiency process and services excellence organize all corporate-wide event such as sports tournament halal bi halal etc ensure company permitting and licenses is update and recorded corporate security conduct regular security assessment in both plan and surrounding area to identify potential risk and vulnerability develop and maintain relationship with local law enforcement and other related stakeholder such as community and other security professional lead investigation of security incident including work with law enforcement institution when necessary collaborate with other function within bsin to ensure all security measures are integrated into all aspect in operation stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in security management ensuring customer and stakeholder satisfaction and engagement providing briefings and reports to security staff and management maintaining operational excellence and service delivery developing strategies to prevent mitigate and respond to threats and risks e g bomb threat demonstrate theft etc managing security risk assessments and supervising incident investigations leading and monitoring the security teams performance coordinating with law enforcement government agencies vendors and other stakeholders participating in special projects related to security business continuity planning assess all ga security related risks and potential threats to the company and create business continuity planning bcp system implement bcp strategy when there are threats to the company such as natural disasters etc develop capability of ga team member to lift up skill and knowledge for sustainability of the operation

deskripsi: about the role we are seeking a dedicated organized and enthusiastic individual to manage our customer service office administration and social media activities the ideal candidate needs to be fluent or strong in communication highly organized and able to work independently while contributing to a collaborative team environment if youre passionate about providing excellent service keeping an office running smoothly and engaging with customers through social media wed love to hear from you as a customer service and office administration staff you will be responsible for a variety of key tasks that keep our company running smoothly and efficiently you will serve as the first point of contact for our patients and customers manage day-to-day office operations and engage with customer through social media this is a dynamic role that requires a proactive individual who is both organized and creative this is a great opportunity for someone with excellent communication and organizational skills a creative mindset and the ability to manage multiple responsibilities what youll be doing provide exceptional service to customers via phone email social media and in-person inquiries monitor social media activity responding to customer comments and inquiries in a timely manner manage schedules and patients appointments ensuring smooth clinic and office operations handle patients administration and payments ensure customers have a positive experience and leave satisfied with our services coordinate and maintain office files and supplies what were looking for university degree proven experience in customer service office administration or a similar role excellent communication skills both written and verbal good negotiation and interpersonal relation skills proficiency in microsoft office suite word excel powerpoint strong multitasking and organizational skills strong attention to detail and accuracy proficiency in social media platforms ability to stay calm and composed under pressure while managing multiple tasks working day is from tuesday to saturday about us orthopaedia indonesia is a leading provider of innovative orthopaedic solutions in indonesia with a focus on quality sustainability and customer satisfaction we are dedicated to improving the lives of our clients through advanced technologies and exceptional service if you are passionate about customer service and eager to contribute to the success of our dynamic organization we encourage you to apply now
label: asli

deskripsi: job description assist in the execution of trade marketing campaigns and promotional activities for modern trade channels maintain and update trade marketing databases reports and documentation coordinate with internal teams sales marketing finance supply chain to ensure smooth execution of trade programs collect and compile sales performance data from modern trade accounts prepare and analyze reports on promotions sales trends and competitor activities monitor and track the effectiveness of trade marketing initiatives ensure the availability and distribution of posm banners shelf talkers wobblers etc to modern trade stores maintain stock records for promotional materials and ensure timely replenishment coordinate with vendors or suppliers for posm production and delivery assist in tracking promotional budgets and expenses ensure all promotional claims and invoices are processed accurately and on time support in documentation and administrative tasks related to trade promotions act as a liaison between trade marketing sales and modern trade partners support in scheduling and coordinating meetings presentations and trade marketing events ensure alignment of trade marketing activities with sales and marketing strategies willingness to travel occasionally for store visits or trade events if required job requirements diploma or bachelors degree in business administration marketing or a related field 1-2 years of experience in administrative roles preferably in trade marketing modern trade or retail industry experience in fmcg skincare or beauty industries is a plus ability to manage multiple administrative tasks efficiently proficient in microsoft excel powerpoint and data analysis tools strong interpersonal skills for liaising with internal and external stakeholders ability to handle administrative challenges and find solutions proactively ability to work under deadlines and prioritize tasks effectively proficiency in mandarin is a plus

deskripsi: we have a vacancy in juanda international airport sub for the position of customer services officer job specifications executing day to day operational tasks to support the station and team to meet objectives handle flight operations duties including arrivals boarding gate and vip hcip monitoring whilst supervising gha team handle baggage management customer feedback investigations baggage performance invoice verification stpc vendors transportation manage ad hoc delays customer feedback and crisis management situations handle stations admin matter accountable documents stationery office equipment amenities invoice verification work permits insurance office rental generate station reports in relation to individual admin tasks and responsibilities as assigned by station manager qualifications and requirements minimum bachelors degree from reputable university fluent in english must be customer oriented and be able to supervise service partner staff effectively must be well-versed and conversant in customer handling technique traffic and cargo operations procedures general aviation knowledge possess a safety security mindset must be proactive and be able to work independently with minimal supervision must be able to write reports and handle routine correspondence with service partner airport authorities and customers must be a team player and willing to go the extra mile to ensure team dynamics and operational excellence must be willing to work in irregular hours if needed including weekend and public holiday willing to be placed in juanda international airport surabaya
label: asli

deskripsi: about the role we are seeking a dedicated organized and enthusiastic individual to manage our customer service office administration and social media activities the ideal candidate needs to be fluent or strong in communication highly organized and able to work independently while contributing to a collaborative team environment if youre passionate about providing excellent service keeping an office running smoothly and engaging with customers through social media wed love to hear from you as a customer service and office administration staff you will be responsible for a variety of key tasks that keep our company running smoothly and efficiently you will serve as the first point of contact for our patients and customers manage day-to-day office operations and engage with customer through social media this is a dynamic role that requires a proactive individual who is both organized and creative this is a great opportunity for someone with excellent communication and organizational skills a creative mindset and the ability to manage multiple responsibilities what youll be doing provide exceptional service to customers via phone email social media and in-person inquiries monitor social media activity responding to customer comments and inquiries in a timely manner manage schedules and patients appointments ensuring smooth clinic and office operations handle patients administration and payments ensure customers have a positive experience and leave satisfied with our services coordinate and maintain office files and supplies what were looking for university degree proven experience in customer service office administration or a similar role excellent communication skills both written and verbal good negotiation and interpersonal relation skills proficiency in microsoft office suite word excel powerpoint strong multitasking and organizational skills strong attention to detail and accuracy proficiency in social media platforms ability to stay calm and composed under pressure while managing multiple tasks working day is from tuesday to saturday about us orthopaedia indonesia is a leading provider of innovative orthopaedic solutions in indonesia with a focus on quality sustainability and customer satisfaction we are dedicated to improving the lives of our clients through advanced technologies and exceptional service if you are passionate about customer service and eager to contribute to the success of our dynamic organization we encourage you to apply now
label: asli

deskripsi: key responsibilities general affair security policy developed implement update and manage all general affair and security policy to ensure both activities in each location are aligned with the procedure general affair contracts manage all ga contracts with third party including the strategy renewal and collaboration with related departments seek possibility to improve services and cost of contract services in ga corporate ga manage and optimize ga budget utilization in all locations through collaboration with hrga managers and implementation of cost efficiency strategy manage kpi achievement in each location and provide necessary support manage all corporate-wide ga activities and collaborate with each location for the implementation e g uniform procurement transportation etc observe ga activity and propose improvement on ga operational to achieve high efficiency process and services excellence organize all corporate-wide event such as sports tournament halal bi halal etc ensure company permitting and licenses is update and recorded corporate security conduct regular security assessment in both plan and surrounding area to identify potential risk and vulnerability develop and maintain relationship with local law enforcement and other related stakeholder such as community and other security professional lead investigation of security incident including work with law enforcement institution when necessary collaborate with other function within bsin to ensure all security measures are integrated into all aspect in operation stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in security management ensuring customer and stakeholder satisfaction and engagement providing briefings and reports to security staff and management maintaining operational excellence and service delivery developing strategies to prevent mitigate and respond to threats and risks e g bomb threat demonstrate theft etc managing security risk assessments and supervising incident investigations leading and monitoring the security teams performance coordinating with law enforcement government agencies vendors and other stakeholders participating in special projects related to security business continuity planning assess all ga security related risks and potential threats to the company and create business continuity planning bcp system implement bcp strategy when there are threats to the company such as natural disasters etc develop capability of ga team member to lift up skill and knowledge for sustainability of the operation

the procedure general affair contracts manage all ga contracts with third party including the strategy renewal and collaboration with related departments seek possibility to improve services and cost of contract services in ga corporate ga manage and optimize ga budget utilization in all locations through collaboration with hrga managers and implementation of cost efficiency strategy manage kpi achievement in each location and provide necessary support manage all corporate-wide ga activities and collaborate with each location for the implementation e g uniform procurement transportation etc observe ga activity and propose improvement on ga operational to achieve high efficiency process and services excellence organize all corporate-wide event such as sports tournament halal bi halal etc ensure company permitting and licenses is update and recorded corporate security conduct regular security assessment in both plan and surrounding area to identify potential risk and vulnerability develop and maintain relationship with local law enforcement and other related stakeholder such as community and other security professional lead investigation of security incident including work with deskripsi: about the role we are seeking a dedicated organized and enthusiastic individual to manage our customer service office administration and social media activities the ideal candidate needs to be fluent or strong in communication highly organized and able to work independently while contributing to a collaborative team environment if youre passionate about providing excellent service keeping an office running smoothly and engaging with customers through social media wed love to hear from you as a customer service and office administration staff you will be responsible for a variety of key tasks that keep our company running smoothly and efficiently you will serve as the first point of contact for our patients and customers manage day-to-day office operations and engage with customer through social media this is a dynamic role that requires a proactive individual who is both organized and creative this is a great opportunity for someone with excellent communication and organizational skills a creative mindset and the ability to manage multiple responsibilities what youll be doing provide exceptional service to customers via phone email social media and in-person inquiries monitor social media activity responding to customer comments and inquiries in a timely manner manage schedules and patients appointments ensuring smooth clinic and office operations handle patients administration and payments ensure customers have a positive experience and leave satisfied with our services coordinate and maintain office files and supplies what were looking for university degree proven experience in customer service office administration or a similar role excellent communication skills both written and verbal good negotiation and interpersonal relation skills proficiency in microsoft office suite word excel powerpoint strong multitasking and organizational skills strong attention to detail and accuracy proficiency in social media platforms ability to stay calm and composed under pressure while managing multiple tasks working day is from tuesday to saturday about us orthopaedia indonesia is a leading provider of innovative orthopaedic solutions in indonesia with a focus on quality sustainability and customer satisfaction we are dedicated to improving the lives of our clients through advanced technologies and exceptional service if you are passionate about customer service and eager to contribute to the success of our dynamic organization we encourage you to apply now

deskripsi: key responsibilities general affair security policy developed implement update and manage all general affair and security policy to ensure both activities in each location are aligned with the procedure general affair contracts manage all ga contracts with third party including the strategy renewal and collaboration with related departments seek possibility to improve services and cost of contract services in ga corporate ga manage and optimize ga budget utilization in all locations through collaboration with hrga managers and implementation of cost efficiency strategy manage kpi achievement in each location and provide necessary support manage all corporate-wide ga activities and collaborate with each location for the implementation e g uniform procurement transportation etc observe ga activity and propose improvement on ga operational to achieve high efficiency process and services excellence organize all corporate-wide event such as sports tournament halal bi halal etc ensure company permitting and licenses is update and recorded corporate security conduct regular security assessment in both plan and surrounding area to identify potential risk and vulnerability develop and maintain relationship with local law enforcement and other related stakeholder such as community and other security professional lead investigation of security incident including work with law enforcement institution when necessary collaborate with other function within bsin to ensure all security measures are integrated into all aspect in operation stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in security management ensuring customer and stakeholder satisfaction and engagement providing briefings and reports to security staff and management maintaining operational excellence and service delivery developing strategies to prevent mitigate and respond to threats and risks e g bomb threat demonstrate theft etc managing security risk assessments and supervising incident investigations leading and monitoring the security teams performance coordinating with law enforcement government agencies vendors and other stakeholders participating in special projects related to security business continuity planning assess all ga security related risks and potential threats to the company and create business continuity planning bcp system implement bcp strategy when there are threats to the company such as natural disasters etc develop capability of ga team member to lift up skill and knowledge for sustainability of the operation

deskripsi: if you just click apply you will not receive a response you must follow the instructions below under how to apply for our team to review and respond to your application complete and qualified applications receive a response within 24 hours summary of opportunity position fresh graduate management training program location jakarta surabaya bandung semarang yogyakarta lampung medan or batam deliveree is seeking ambitious hard working and career-focused candidates who have recently received their undergraduate degree from a recognized university in indonesia or abroad all majors are welcome to apply to qualify you must have a strong interest in business or operations in a logistics technology environment you must be willing to work very hard in a fast moving accelerated environment with your career development as your top priority when you interview with us you will be considered for assignment in several possible departments including enterprise sales digital marketing operational excellence supply chain management booking operations fleet training fleet recruiting telemarketing finance human resources and administration you are encouraged to rotate to new departments once you have mastered your current assignment this usually takes 2 years while we expect you to be mobile and able to travel your home base will be either our jakarta hq or satellite offices in surabaya bandung semarang or yogyakarta if this description excites you please read our qualification requirements below and then follow the instructions carefully under how to apply qualifications undergraduate gpa of 3 0 or higher from any major fresh graduates or candidates with 1-2 years of experience are welcome to apply excellent english skills excellent speaking and writing skills self-motivated independent and hard-working strong reasoning logic and analysis skills benefits competitive monthly salary merit-based promotions full private healthcare coverage annual paid leave 13th-month bonus remote working for 6 weeks every year available during ramadan and christmas how to apply submit the below items via email to christine at deliveree dot com - if you submit all deskripsi: about the role we are seeking a dedicated organized and enthusiastic individual to manage our customer service office administration and social media activities the ideal candidate needs to be fluent or strong in communication highly organized and able to work independently while contributing to a collaborative team environment if youre passionate about providing excellent service keeping an office running smoothly and engaging with customers through social media wed love to hear from you as a customer service and office administration staff you will be responsible for a variety of key tasks that keep our company running smoothly and efficiently you will serve as the first point of contact for our patients and customers manage day-to-day office operations and engage with customer through social media this is a dynamic role that requires a proactive individual who is both organized and creative this is a great opportunity for someone with excellent communication and organizational skills a creative mindset and the ability to manage multiple responsibilities what youll be doing provide exceptional service to customers via phone email social media and in-person inquiries monitor social media activity responding to customer comments and inquiries in a timely manner manage schedules and patients appointments ensuring smooth clinic and office operations handle patients administration and payments ensure customers have a positive experience and leave satisfied with our services coordinate and maintain office files and supplies what were looking for university degree proven experience in customer service office administration or a similar role excellent communication skills both written and verbal good negotiation and interpersonal relation skills proficiency in microsoft office suite word excel powerpoint strong multitasking and organizational skills strong attention to detail and accuracy proficiency in social media platforms ability to stay calm and composed under pressure while managing multiple tasks working day is from tuesday to saturday about us orthopaedia indonesia is a leading provider of innovative orthopaedic solutions in indonesia with a focus on quality sustainability and customer satisfaction we are dedicated to improving the lives of our clients through advanced technologies and exceptional service if you are passionate about customer service and eager to contribute to the success of our dynamic organization we encourage you to apply now

deskripsi: key responsibilities general affair security policy developed implement update and manage all general affair and security policy to ensure both activities in each location are aligned with the procedure general affair contracts manage all ga contracts with third party including the strategy renewal and collaboration with related departments seek possibility to improve services and cost of contract services in ga corporate ga manage and optimize ga budget utilization in all locations through collaboration with hrga managers and implementation of cost efficiency strategy manage kpi achievement in each location and provide necessary support manage all corporate-wide ga activities and collaborate with each location for the implementation e g uniform procurement transportation etc observe ga activity and propose improvement on ga operational to achieve high efficiency process and services excellence organize all corporate-wide event such as sports tournament halal bi halal etc ensure company permitting and licenses is update and recorded corporate security conduct regular security assessment in both plan and surrounding area to identify potential risk and vulnerability develop and maintain relationship with local law enforcement and other related stakeholder such as community and other security professional lead investigation of security incident including work with law enforcement institution when necessary collaborate with other function within bsin to ensure all security measures are integrated into all aspect in operation stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in security management ensuring customer and stakeholder satisfaction and engagement providing briefings and reports to security staff and management maintaining operational excellence and service delivery developing strategies to prevent mitigate and respond to threats and risks e g bomb threat demonstrate theft etc managing security risk assessments and supervising incident investigations leading and monitoring the security teams performance coordinating with law enforcement government agencies vendors and other stakeholders participating in special projects related to security business continuity planning assess all ga security related risks and potential threats to the company and create business continuity planning bcp system implement bcp strategy when there are threats to the company such as natural disasters etc develop capability of ga team member to lift up skill and knowledge for sustainability of the operation

deskripsi: key responsibilities general affair security policy developed implement update and manage all general affair and security policy to ensure both activities in each location are aligned with the procedure general affair contracts manage all ga contracts with third party including the strategy renewal and collaboration with related departments seek possibility to improve services and cost of contract services in ga corporate ga manage and optimize ga budget utilization in all locations through collaboration with hrga managers and implementation of cost efficiency strategy manage kpi achievement in each location and provide necessary support manage all corporate-wide ga activities and collaborate with each location for the implementation e g uniform procurement transportation etc observe ga activity and propose improvement on ga operational to achieve high efficiency process and services excellence organize all corporate-wide event such as sports tournament halal bi halal etc ensure company permitting and licenses is update and recorded corporate security conduct regular security assessment in both plan and surrounding area to identify potential risk and vulnerability develop and maintain relationship with local law enforcement and other related stakeholder such as community and other security professional lead investigation of security incident including work with law enforcement institution when necessary collaborate with other function within bsin to ensure all security measures are integrated into all aspect in operation stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in security management ensuring customer and stakeholder satisfaction and engagement providing briefings and reports to security staff and management maintaining operational excellence and service delivery developing strategies to prevent mitigate and respond to threats and risks e g bomb threat demonstrate theft etc managing security risk assessments and supervising incident investigations leading and monitoring the security teams performance coordinating with law enforcement government agencies vendors and other stakeholders participating in special projects related to security business continuity planning assess all ga security related risks and potential threats to the company and create business continuity planning bcp system implement bcp strategy of contract services in ga corporate ga manage and optimize ga budget utilization in all locations through collaboration with hrga managers and implementation of cost efficiency strategy manage kpi
